snippet: The United States owes a debt to the police officers who put themselves in danger to protect the nation, President Barack Obama said Monday as he honored the nation's top police officers at the White House....

headline.print_headline: Honoring Cops, Obama Says US Owes Police a Debt
headline.main: Honoring Cops, Obama Says US Owes Police a Debt

lead_paragraph: The United States owes a debt to the police officers who put themselves in danger to protect the nation, President Barack Obama said Monday as he honored the nation's top police officers at the White House.
